author: dsosnoski
msg: Fix AXIS2-2549 null pointer exception when using JiBX without a binding
Also avoid creating an instance object when unmarshalling unless separate create-type used (allowing for substitution group support)

author: jonesde
msg: Implemented feature to support excemption inheritance, used for example when a county tax is setup and the customer has an exemption with the state

author: danj
msg: added missing <ChangeType/> element to sample RMD fragment.

msg: Warn about the time and energy required.
